scripts.test-arbitrum-base: node functions/Swapper.js swap arbitrum base USDC USDC 1000000

scripts.test-avalanche-base: node functions/Swapper.js swap avalanche base USDC USDC 1000000
scripts.test-optimism-polygon: node functions/Swapper.js swap optimism polygon USDC USDC 1000000
scripts.test-fantom-ethereum: node functions/Swapper.js swap fantom ethereum USDC USDC 1000000
